resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105422</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105422</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105794</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Read On - Experiences with Literature that Has Changed Us</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gelesene an - Erfahrungen mit Literatur, die uns 
geändert hat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En fonction lues - expériences avec la 
littérature qui nous a changés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">- experiências sobre lidas com literatura que nos
mudou</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">- esperienze sopra colte con letteratura che li ha
cambiati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαβάστε επάνω - εμπειρία με τη λογοτεχνία που μας 
έχει αλλάξει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encendido leídas - experiencias con la literatura
que nos ha cambiado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson students will consider the question 'Why do we read?' through creating and sharing individual timelines of their own histories as readers. Each student will then choose a book on which to write a personal essay.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion betrachten Kursteilnehmer die 
Frage ', warum wir lesen?' durch das Erstellen und das Teilen 
der einzelnen timelines ihrer eigenen Geschichten als Leser. 
Jeder Kursteilnehmer wählt dann ein Buch, auf dem einen 
persönlichen Versuch schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon les étudiants considéreront la
question 'pourquoi  nous lisons?' en créant et en partageant 
différentes chronologies de leurs propres histoires comme lecteurs. 
Chaque étudiant choisira alors un livre sur lequel pour écrire
un essai personnel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição os estudantes considerarão a 
pergunta ' porque  nós lemos?' com criar e compartilhar de 
timelines individuais de seus próprios histories como leitores. 
Cada estudante escolherá então um livro em que para escrever 
um essay pessoal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione allievi considereranno la 
domanda 'perchè leggiamo?' through la creazione e ripartendo di
diversi timelines dei loro propri dati storici come lettori. 
Ogni allievo allora sceglierà un libro su cui scrivere un 
saggio personale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα οι σπουδαστές θα εξετάσουν ότι η 
ερώτηση "γιατί διαβάζουμε;" μέσω της δημιουργίας και της 
διανομής των μεμονωμένων υποδείξεων ως προς το χρόνο των ιστοριών
τους ως αναγνώστες. Κάθε σπουδαστής θα επιλέξει έπειτα ένα
βιβλίο στο οποίο να γράψει ένα προσωπικό δοκίμιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección los estudiantes considerarán la 
pregunta ' porqué lo hacemos leemos?' con crear y compartir 
timelines individuales de sus propias historias como programas de 
lectura. Cada estudiante entonces elegirá un libro en el cual 
escribir un ensayo personal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHERINE SCHULTEN
FN:KATHERINE SCHULTEN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105794</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105422</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/read-on-experiences-with-literature-that-has-changed-us</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
